Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       THAT WAS ONE OF THE BIGGESTS MODES I HAVE EVER WITNESSED! NOT JUST 
BECAUSE IT AHPPENED TO ME, BUT BECAUSE ITS SUCH A GIGANTIC MODE. YOU COULD 
HAVE BEEN A LITTLE MORE DISCREET WITH IT. YOU DIDNT EVEN GIVE ME A CHANCE TO 
DEFEND MYSELF.      

       Megatron, Rampage, and Marine look at the walls crumble around them. 
The bots that led them in here were no where to be seen. Megatron was furious.
       "A trap! I should have known it! I vow that they will all perish by my 
hands! Yes." He said, as a chunk falls to the ground.
       Rampage sent four large missles sailing into the ceiling, and MArine 
fired two more. A large hole sent a stream of light down on them.
       Megatron flew out, while Rampage and Marine climed up a grappling 
rope. Once outside they vacated the area as the base came to a final crumble.



--part1_a2.fe1f709.27b4716d_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
